dialogue.text: Alrighty...that was cool and all but it's time for us to get back to signing stuff. Thank you for your support and goodbye.
Woah, um… sorry I didn’t mean to say that! ha ha! (what is happening to me...?)
I know I said only one more but this time will truly be my last.
I’m trying my best to keep my cool. Keep it cool, GF... keep it cool...
I don’t know Boyfriend, something is telling me she’s just not normal. I really wouldn’t bother.
I'm sure he would be bothered having your lame butt around him all the time. He wants some excitement in his life for once.
You think I'm scared of you? I've been through hell and back, and you're not even close to the girl poop I took this morning...
Just do me a favor and run along. I'm really trying to be nice here but you're not giving me much of a choice here, miss.
Why don't we just let the man speak and decide, cuz last time i checked, i don't remember pipsqueaks learning how to speak.
So boyfriend, pretty please with a cherry on top covered with sprinkles and fudge and gummy bears and an intergalactic cinnamon swirl-
ALRIGHT. JEEZ. Ugh, okay! One more, and you got to go. Sorry but we can’t be doing this all night in the cold.
Hooray! (I can finally use these powers now.… let’s see if these actually work.)
